packs.pack_description: Dirt will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Grass will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Cobblestone will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures.
Randomly rotates Moss Blocks and Moss Carpets to break up ugly grid patterns.
Bricks will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures.
Birch Logs will be randomized using a selection of 6 textures.
Red Mushroom Blocks will be randomized using a selection of 12 textures.
End Stone will be randomized using a selection of 5 textures.
Randomly rotates Gravel to break up ugly grid patterns.
Mycelium will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
All planks will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Stone will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Terracotta will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Unpolished Stones will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures.
Bookshelves will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures.
Adds varying skin tones to Villagers depending on the heat of the biome.
